message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe is worth a significant amount of money.  I'm not able to disclose the exact nature of the product at this time, but I can assure you it has substantial value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.  This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find this kind of opportunity elsewhere. Please let me know if you're interested.
